modName: Last ENB Injection I will ever need
summary: For a game that is stunning no matter how you dress it up, it can be hard to settle on just one graphic look, so here are the \'Go To\' visual settings that ended my long search to find the perfect Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][heading][size=+2][color=red]THIS MOD IS NO LONGER SUPPORTED. FOR NEW VERSION PLEASE DOWNLOAD [/color][color=cyan]BPENB[/color][color=red] WHICH CAN BE FOUND AT THE LINK BELOW[/color][/size][/heading][/center]

[heading][center][size=+3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20832]BPENB[/url][/size][/center][/heading]


[youtube]36uYeeKMAVU[/youtube]

BIG thanks to Saio TV for this AWESOME review! 

IF you like the mod please ENDORSE and feel free to post your own awesome screens in the user pics area :)


[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg850/scaled.php?server=850&filename=zhmm.jpg&res=medium[/img]
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg193/scaled.php?server=193&filename=zstatic.jpg&res=medium[/img]
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg818/scaled.php?server=818&filename=zdark.jpg&res=medium[/img]




Here are some words from fellow nexus users about Last ENB Injection:

\"this mod... just... wow, how is this not the most downloaded mod on nexus?\" -Lucav50

\"I\'m surprised that this configuration hasn\'t gotten more attention, it\'s easily the best.\" -LightShadeInc

\"THE TITLE IS TRUE.I\'ve been testing everyones supposed \"perfect seffings\" over past few weeks. this one NAILED IT.. for real.\" -Biorr

\"Sweet Jesus you were not joking. This is definitely gonna be the last ENB Injection I\'ll ever need. This is amazing..\" -Derek4Real412

\"EXCELLENT ! You got my vote sir. This has got to be the best mod out there. I can almost smell the green grass and trees with these smooth colors..\" -RiggsRx

00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000oooooooooooooooooooooooo.........................
Last ENB Injection I will ever need...
00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000oooooooooooooooooooooooo.........................

...that\'s not true of course, like many of you I like to change my graphic settings depending on my mood. There are so many custom settings and Skyrim manages to look beautiful in almost all of them. But if I HAD to pick just one \'all around\' configuration to use, this would probably be it. These settings stray away from the fantasy look, have a more photo-realistic feel and the most natural light I have seen in Skyrim to date. For me, this is the most immersive Skyrim can get!

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:
Go to the ENB homepage here:  http://enbdev.com/index_en.html
Download the latest version of ENB for TES Skyrim(0.113)and READ THE INSTRUCTIONS AND INFO ON HIS PAGE on how to install ENB. You must install the WRAPPER version, not the injector version!!
Then just copy the contents of LastENBv7.rar to your MAIN Skyrim folder, not the data folder and overwrite all files. 
If you want to remove the letterbox effect, copy over and overwrite with the file in the optional folder. 
If you want to remove SSAO, DoF and AF to for a major increase in performance, copy over and overwrite with the file from the optional performance folder
It is recommended to uninstall mods like Realistic Lighting, RCRN, etc.. as it will clash with this ENB configuration and see below for recommended mods to use with this setup.

RECOMMENDED MODS:
--Creepy Dungeons  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12808
This is used to give dark interiors without having to use the Realistic Lighting mod
--Sun and Cloud textures  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2616
Majorly overlooked mod that will turn the skies of Skyrim into something more beautiful
--Interior and Dungeon Fog Remover  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=736
--Revamped Exterior Fog  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9930
Greatly improves the fog around Skyrim
--Dark Dungeons for ENB  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12454
Gives certain dungeons night time settings

All credit goes to the creators of the original mods-Boris 
Vorontsov and some_dude. Also based on the work of 
HeliosDoubleSix.


And as with all enb/injector mods, you need to see it in game to get the true experience 
so don\'t just judge by the screens, try it out for yourself! Feel free to leave some feedback, everyones rig is different so let me know how it works for you. 


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VERSION HISTORY

V7
----------------
Utilizing the new ENB v0.113, this REQUIRES you to go to the ENB homepage to download the dll file as it is prohibited to be uploaded to the Nexus. Just access the main page by going here:http://enbdev.com/index_en.html then go to the downloads section and select TES Skyrim and download v0.113. Open up the folder marked \'wrapper version\' and copy the d3d9.dll file to your main Skyrim folder and overwrite if prompted. Then copy over the files from the LastENBv7.rar. 

V6
----------------
2 Presets- Bloom, and Default both with optional files for performance and removing the letterbox
-Major sky overhaul for clear days and very natural looking nights
-Default version has massively reduced bloom
-Completely reworked depth of field

V5.1 LastENB for Realistic Lighting with Customization
----------------
You must install Realistic Lighting to get the most out of this config and it should also work well with any custom ini files for RL that you may use. 

V5
--------------
3 Presets all with options for no letterbox and different degrees of brightness
-Default, all around config, 3 degrees of brightness
-Classic, more vibrant color, less bloom and contrast, 2 degrees of brightness
-Performance, No DoF, VERY fps friendly, 2 degrees of brightness

None of these settings use SSAO so they play nice with low to mid range rigs, esp the performance config


BETA 5
----------------
Pretty big update but I wanted to call this beta in hopes that the next release be final. All these presets have SSAO disabled and are very friendly to your framerate!

5 Presets available all with optional files to remove the letterbox effect:

-- Normal: All around config, darker nights than vanilla but not too dark, natural color saturation
-- Dark: Darker nights and interiors, general gloominess but with crisp clear days, config I use the most personally
-- Classic: Brighter and more colorful, more \'video gamey\', fun!
--DeSaturated: Less color saturation, can make for some photo realistic moments
--Performance: Even more performance from this config, No DoF or SSAO


V4b
---------
-small update to add optional files to remove letterbox effect
-Three presets to choose from: Classic, Dark and Performance

V4
---------
-Major overhaul, Skyrim as you have never experienced. 
-Bring a torch! Darker nights featured in v4

V 3b
---------
-New subtle but effective DoF and letterbox effect. 
-This is a HQ config so you may have a drop in fps (edit: v3b adds performance option).
-For use with Realistic Lighting Mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7654
and Psychosteves custom settings http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7654
V2.0b
----------
-fix, one minor tweak i forgot to apply to v2 resulting in MUCH nicer days
-last update i promise!

V2.0
----------
Tweaked to perfection! It doesn\'t get any better than this and with three settings for night and cave brightness

V1.03
----------
Slightly reduced bloom and slightly brighter nights and caves. 

V1.02
----------
-minor tweaks to nights, sharpness
-brighter storms
-slightly nerfed bloom

V1.01
---------
- Added optional files for less blur and bloom.

V1.0 
---------
- Features dark nights and caves, ruins, interiors etc..
- Subtle sharpening. If you don\'t like the sharpness simply press the pause key on your keyboard
- FPS Friendly!! If there is a request I will make a SSAO version in an update
- Tasteful lens flare- no more disco lights!

Have fun and enjoy! And please ENDORSE if you like the mod!
author: joey4track
